name: Brigal Nature Yellow
description: Brigal Nature Yellow are inks with a high percentage of vegetable base, they present a very good balance water-ink, very good transfer and therefore excellent performance. They have a low draft and viscosity to cover a very wide range of supports. common in offset. It is a range recommended for printing glossy coated paper, offset, recycled, cardboard and cardboard; it is also suitable for matte substrates and semi mates. They are inks formulated mainly with renewable Raw Materials; they present a low level of odor, low level of VOCs, they are also free of heavy metals, halogenated hydrocarbons and any other substance dangerous to health or the environment, therefore they are recommended for printing food packaging secondary, cosmetic packaging, pharmaceuticals, textbooks and catalogs.
